participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Confident and assertive, with a hint of playfulness.
participant_1.background: A professional wrestler who enjoys engaging with people, but can feel frustrated when not met with enthusiasm.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Reserved and thoughtful, often lost in her own world.
participant_2.background: An introverted individual who enjoys observing rather than participating in conversations, which can lead to misunderstandings.
